mapper.select: select tb_document.document_id, tb_document.title, tb_document.description, tb_document.last_edit_time, tb_document.first_picture, tb_type.type_id, tb_type.type_name, tb_user.user_id, tb_user.image, tb_user.nickname from tb_document, tb_user, tb_type where tb_document.user_id=tb_user.user_id and tb_type.type_id = tb_document.type_id and tb_document.published=1 order by tb_document.last_edit_time desc limit #{begin},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_document where published = 1
select document_id,title from tb_document where recommend=1 and published=1 order by last_edit_time desc limit #{count}

select * from tb_document doc, tb_user user, tb_type type, tb_document_tag tag, tb_tag tbtag where doc.type_id = type.type_id and doc.document_id = tag.document_id and doc.user_id = user.user_id and tag.tag_id = tbtag.tag_id and doc.document_id = #{documentId }

select DISTINCT(doc.document_id), doc.title, doc.description, doc.user_id, doc.last_edit_time, user.image, doc.first_picture, doc.type_id, type.type_name, user.nickname from tb_document doc, tb_user user, tb_type type where doc.type_id = #{typeId} and doc.type_id = type.type_id and doc.user_id = user.user_id order by doc.last_edit_time desc LIMIT #{begin},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_document where type_id = #{typeId}
select DATE_FORMAT(doc.last_edit_time,'%Y-%M') as year from tb_document doc where doc.published=1 GROUP BY year order by STR_TO_DATE(year,'%Y-%M') desc limit #{begin},#{pageSize};
select DATE_FORMAT(doc.last_edit_time,'%Y-%M') as year from tb_document doc where doc.published=1 GROUP BY year

select * from tb_document doc, tb_user user, tb_type type, tb_document_tag tag, tb_tag tbtag where doc.type_id = type.type_id and doc.published = 1 and doc.document_id = tag.document_id and doc.user_id = user.user_id and tag.tag_id = tbtag.tag_id and DATE_FORMAT(doc.last_edit_time,'%Y-%M') = #{time} order by doc.last_edit_time desc

select * from tb_document doc, tb_user user, tb_type type, tb_document_tag tag, tb_tag tbtag where doc.type_id = type.type_id and doc.document_id = tag.document_id and doc.user_id = user.user_id and tag.tag_id = tbtag.tag_id and doc.user_id = #{userId} limit #{begin},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_document where user_id = #{userId}
